channel.title: Import Scans on DefectDojo Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Import Scans on DefectDojo Documentation

item.title: Import Scan Form
item.description: If you have a brand new DefectDojo instance, the Import Scan Form is a logical first step to learn the software and set up your environment.

item.title: Add new Findings to a Test via Reimport
item.description: When a Test is created in DefectDojo (either in advance or by importing a scan file), the Test can be extended with new Finding data.

item.title: Smart Upload for infrastructure scans
item.description: Smart upload is a specialized importer that ingests reports from infrastructure scanning tools, including: Nexpose NMap OpenVas Qualys Tenable Smart Upload is unique in that it can split Findings from a scan file into separate Products.

item.title: Create an automated import pipeline via API
item.description: DefectDojoâ€™s API allows for robust pipeline solutions, which automatically ingest new scans to your instance. Automation like this can take a few different forms:
